Text:
Great quality, as always from skJGZV6z.
Nice to see, that you are adding more interesting shows to the list. Took them many years and two FED capos (recently) to notice what was known from the beginning of the bank cartel in US... as more they "regulate" the more economy is bubbling and buckles...

Well thanks, std. def. is all I can do, but it's not nothing anyway.

If you liked this program, try this podcast episode:
http://files.libertyfund.org:80/econtalk/y2013/Admatibanks.mp3
From this series, an excellent one:
http://www.econlib.org:80/library/EconTalk.xml
